long pull the end through the last st worsted weight cotton yarn an h crochet hook and sew the yarn tails back through the chain less than 30 minutes enjoy thread this cord through the top row of eyelets materials lily sugar n cream or cotton worsted weight yarn tie the two ends together in a secure knot about 1 16 yards for sack + 2 yards for drawcord from the ends this gives you a hanger for the bag as size h 5 mm crochet hook well as keeping the yarn tails from working loose large eye tapestry needle slip a bar of soap into the sack and it s ready to use finished size 3 x 5 fits a
